structure.unit: STATE AND REGIONAL MENTAL HEALTH PROGRAMS

law.text: Religious instruction and ministration for patients of the institutions operated by the Cabinet for Health and Family Services shall be provided.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 311, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 256, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 418, sec. 16, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107(1) and (9). -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 50, sec. 13, effective July 1, 1952.
